ProductInfo.Features:

<8> PD Digital SLR Camera Case + <9> 67mm UV Filter + <10> 58mm UV Filter + <11> PD HDMI to Mini-HDMI Cable +
<12> PD SDHC Memory Card Reader + <13> PD 6pc Complete Cleaning Kit + <14> LCD Screen Protectors + <15> PD Memory Card Storage Wallet
